Swipe up from the bottom of the screen to open the app drawer.
Scroll down to view more apps in the app drawer.
Scroll down to open the VLC application.
Click "GO TO MEDIALIBRARY PREFERENCES" to select directories to include.
Click "Internal memory" to view its subfolders.
Click on "Recordings" to access the folder.
Navigate back to "Internal memory" from the "Recordings" folder.
